message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Learning (ML) as it deals with the evaluation of meaning representations for words in context. Specifically, it focuses on the limitations of existing word embeddings and proposes a new dataset, WiC, for evaluating context-sensitive representations. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, since the paper proposes a new dataset and uses annotations curated by experts, it may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, since the paper deals with information retrieval and semantic similarity, it may also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
